member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.AbandonAllStoryboards
member.summary: Abandons all active storyboards.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.CreateAnimationVariable
member.summary: Creates a new animation variable.
member.param: The initial value for the animation variable.
The new animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.CreateAnimationVectorVariable
member.summary: Creates a new animation variable for each specified dimension.
member.param: A vector (of size cDimension) of initial values for the animation variable.
The number of dimensions that require animated values. This parameter specifies the number of values listed in initialValue.
The new animation variable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.CreateStoryboard
member.summary: Creates a new storyboard.
member.param: The new storyboard.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.EstimateNextEventTime
member.summary: Retrieves an estimate of the time interval before the next animation event.
member.param: The estimated time, in seconds.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.FinishAllStoryboards
member.summary: Finishes all active storyboards within the specified time interval.
member.param: The maximum time interval during which all storyboards must be finished.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.GetStatus
member.summary: Gets the status of the animation manager.
member.param: The status of the animation manager.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.GetStoryboardFromTag
member.summary: Gets the storyboard with the specified tag.
member.param: The object portion of the tag. This parameter can be NULL.
The identifier portion of the tag.
The storyboard that matches the specified tag, or NULL if no match is found.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.GetVariableFromTag
member.summary: Gets the animation variable with the specified tag.
member.param: The object portion of the tag. This parameter can be NULL.
The identifier portion of the tag.
The animation variable that matches the specified tag, or NULL if no match is found.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.Pause
member.summary: Pauses all animations.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.Resume
member.summary: Resumes all animations.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.ScheduleTransition
member.summary: Creates and schedules a single-transition storyboard.
member.param: The animation variable.
A transition to be applied to the animation variable.
The current system time.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.SetAnimationMode
member.summary: Sets the animation mode.
member.param: The animation mode.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.SetCancelPriorityComparison
member.summary: Sets the priority comparison handler that determines whether a scheduled storyboard can be canceled.

param.name: comparison
param.para: The priority comparison handler for cancelation.
The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL. See Remarks for more info.

member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.SetCompressPriorityComparison
member.summary: Sets the priority comparison handler that determines whether a scheduled storyboard can be compressed.

param.name: comparison
param.para: The priority comparison handler for compression.
The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL. See Remarks for more info.

member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.SetConcludePriorityComparison
member.summary: Sets the priority comparison handler that determines whether a scheduled storyboard can be concluded.
member.param: The priority comparison handler for conclusion. The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL. See Remarks for more info.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.SetDefaultLongestAcceptableDelay
member.summary: Sets the default acceptable animation delay. This is the length of time that may pass before storyboards begin.
member.param: The default delay. This parameter can be a positive value, or UI_ANIMATION_SECONDS_EVENTUALLY (-1) to indicate that any finite delay is acceptable.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.SetManagerEventHandler
member.summary: Specifies a handler for animation manager status updates.

param.name: handler
param.para: The event handler to be called when the status of the animation manager changes.
The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL. See Remarks for more info.

member.param: If TRUE, specifies that will incorporate handler into its estimate of the time interval until the next animation event. No default value.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.SetTrimPriorityComparison
member.summary: Sets the priority comparison handler that determines whether a scheduled storyboard can be trimmed.

param.name: comparison
param.para: The priority comparison handler for trimming.
The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL.

member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.Shutdown
member.summary: Shuts down the animation manager and all its associated objects.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2.Update
member.summary: Updates the values of all animation variables.
member.param: The current system time. This parameter must be greater than or equal to 0.0.
The result of the update. You can omit this parameter from calls to this method.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager2
member.summary: Defines an animation manager, which provides a central interface for creating and managing animations in multiple dimensions.
